ice-machines.name: Ice-O-Matic
ice-machines.description: This self-monitoring cube ice machine is equipped with external indicator lights, which alert your staff when it's time to perform normal maintenance or call for service before there's an emergency. The result is today's most reliable, foolproof ice system, as its one-touch concept saves time and money. And because it's the most energy efficient, there's no smarter choice.

freezers.name: Solid Door Reach-In Freezer
freezers.description: Whether you’re storing pre-made portions of your signature dishes, frozen french fries, or frozen ingredients, the Avantco A-19F-HC is perfect for your small restaurant, cafe, or bakery. This unit has a spacious cabinet with multiple adjustable shelves, but it's still small enough to fit in places where larger units would not. With a powerful refrigeration system and environmentally-safe refrigerant, your ingredients and fully-prepared foods will stay at safe frozen temperatures.

storage.name: Shelving Cart with 2 Baskets
storage.description: No matter what kind of business you operate, it’s important that you have a convenient way to move your large supplies around your establishment. Thanks to the Regency 18” x 36” 1 shelf and 1 basket utility cart, you can do just that. Each shelf on this product has a weight capacity of 450 lb., making it great for moving heavier products and pieces of equipment around your back-of-house area. This utility cart is also crafted from durable chrome materials that are sure to stand up to long-term use in your commercial environment.

tabletop.name: Aluminum Stock Pot Set
tabletop.description: The stock pots are perfect for throwing together a soup-of-the-day, steaming fresh vegetables, or whipping up a whopping batch of creamy mashed potatoes. This set includes three stock pots with lids.

disposables.name: EcoChoice Pulp Fiber 1 Cup Carrier with Trays
disposables.description: A great eco-friendly choice for your business, this carrier with tray is made from rough molded fiber and 100% recycled material. Your customers can place an 8 to 32 oz. cup with a pedestal base in the cup holder. The ample tray section is ideal for holding hamburgers, hot dogs, french fries, baked goods, and sandwiches. For optimal usage, be sure to first place a layer of deli paper on the tray section before putting food on it.
